2.title: Self-driving car
2.author: Ilon Musk
2.content: The best car is one, that you don't need to drive

3.title: Drug addict
3.author: Irvine Welsh
3.content: Choose us. Choose life. Choose mortgage payments. choose washing machines. choose cars. choose sitting on a couch watching mind-numbing and spirit-crushing game shows, stuffing fuckin junk food intae yir mooth. Choose rotting away, pishing and shiteing yersel in a home, a total fuckin embarrassment tae the selfish, fucked-up brats ye've produced. Choose life.

4.title: Dagon
4.author: Lovecraft
4.content: I cannot think of the deap sea
